tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_quality_studies (
 study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 study_name VARCHAR,
 institution_name VARCHAR,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
 study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 study_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 institution_id INT,
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 CONSTRAINT fk_institution
 FOREIGN KEY (institution_id)
 REFERENCES healthcare_institutions (institution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
    study_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE study_results (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_id INT NOT NULL,
  participant_id INT NOT NULL,
  result_data JSON,
  FOREIGN KEY (study_id) REFERENCES research_studies(study_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES study_participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE researchers (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  institution_id INT,
  research_area VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES institutions(institution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
  study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  study_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  researcher_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  research_study_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (research_study_id) REFERENCES research_studies(study_id)
);

CREATE TABLE data_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  data_content TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);
